statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_data;
SELECT site_name, wind_pattern FROM renewable_energy_data WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM renewable_energy_data WHERE wind_pattern > 10;
SELECT site_id, sunlight_intensity FROM renewable_energy_data WHERE site_name LIKE 'Solar%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_data ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, wind_pattern FROM renewable_energy_data WHERE wind_pattern > 10 ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_data WHERE sunlight_intensity < 50;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM renewable_energy_data WHERE wind_pattern > 5 AND sunlight_intensity < 80 ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT site_name, wind_pattern, sunlight_intensity FROM renewable_energy_data WHERE wind_pattern > 20 OR sunlight_intensity > 70 ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sites, AVG(wind_pattern) AS avg_wind_pattern FROM renewable_energy_data;
SELECT * FROM wind_patterns ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, wind_speed FROM wind_patterns WHERE wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT location FROM sunlight_intensity WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, intensity FROM sunlight_intensity WHERE intensity > 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wind_patterns WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location, wind_speed FROM wind_patterns WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, intensity FROM sunlight_intensity WHERE intensity >= 50 ORDER BY location DESC, intensity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM wind_patterns WHERE location = 'New York' AND wind_speed < 20 ORDER BY wind_speed ASC, location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sunlight_intensity WHERE location = 'California' AND intensity BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY location ASC, intensity DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT id, location FROM wind_patterns JOIN sunlight_intensity ON wind_patterns.location = sunlight_intensity.location WHERE wind_speed > 15 AND intensity > 60 ORDER BY intensity DESC, wind_speed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM wind_patterns WHERE wind_speed > 20
SELECT location_id, wind_speed FROM wind_patterns WHERE location_id = 5
SELECT id, location_id, date_time FROM sunlight_intensity ORDER BY date_time DESC
SELECT * FROM site_selection WHERE selected = TRUE
SELECT id, location_id, selected_datetime FROM site_selection WHERE selected_datetime >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, location_id, wind_speed, date_time FROM wind_patterns WHERE wind_speed > 50.00 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT location_id, intensity FROM sunlight_intensity WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY intensity ASC;
SELECT * FROM site_selection WHERE selected = TRUE AND location_id = 5;
SELECT location_id, intensity, date_time FROM sunlight_intensity WHERE intensity BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT location_id, selected, selected_datetime FROM site_selection WHERE selected_datetime >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM WindPatterns;
SELECT id, location FROM SunlightIntensity ORDER BY intensity DESC;
SELECT site_name, area_sqft FROM RenewableEnergySite WHERE area_sqft > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT site_name, energy_output AS production FROM RenewableEnergySite JOIN EnergyProduction ON RenewableEnergySite.id = EnergyProduction.site_id;
SELECT * FROM WindPatterns ORDER BY location ASC, wind_speed DESC;
SELECT id, location, intensity FROM SunlightIntensity WHERE hours_of_sunlight > 8;
SELECT site_name, area_sqft FROM RenewableEnergySite WHERE area_sqft BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT w.location, w.wind_speed, e.energy_output FROM WindPatterns w JOIN EnergyProduction e ON w.id = e.site_id;
SELECT s.site_name, e.production_date, si.intensity FROM RenewableEnergySite s JOIN EnergyProduction e ON s.id = e.site_id JOIN SunlightIntensity si ON s.site_location = si.location;
SELECT * FROM WindPatterns ORDER BY wind_speed DESC, location ASC;
SELECT id, location, wind_speed FROM WindPatterns WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT id, location, wind_speed, direction FROM WindPatterns WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT * FROM SunlightIntensity WHERE time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT resource_type, capacity, status FROM EnergyResources WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindPatterns WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT id, location, wind_speed FROM WindPatterns ORDER BY wind_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM SunlightIntensity WHERE time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT id, location, suitability FROM SiteSelection WHERE recommendation LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT id, location, latitude, longitude FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY latitude DESC
